text: Pchyolka () is a rural locality (a village) in Leninsky Selsoviet, Kuyurgazinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 2 as of 2010. There are 5 streets. == Geography == It is located 30 km from Yermolayevo, 3 km from Bugulchan. == References == Category:Rural localities in Kuyurgazinsky District
title: Pchyolka, Republic of Bashkortostan
